title: Tour de France stage 6: Tadej Poga훾ar bounces back, Jonas Vingegaard snatches yellow, Jai Hindley fades
content:
The mighty Tourmalet puts an end to Hindley's yellow jersey and Poga훾ar turns tables on Vingegaard in another wild ride.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 6: Tadej Poga훾ar bounces back, Jonas Vingegaard snatches yellow, Jai Hindley fades on Velo.
